flowSwitches.name: FLOW SWITCH
flowSwitches.description: The LEFOO Flow Switch is a precision-engineered device for monitoring liquid flow in HVAC, water, and industrial systems. It provides reliable detection of flow deviations, ensuring system protection, optimal performance, and long-term operational stability.

ecoFlowSwitch.name: ECO FLOW SWITCH
ecoFlowSwitch.description: The LEFOO Flow Switch ensures accurate monitoring of liquid flow in industrial, HVAC, and water systems. It protects equipment by detecting low or high flow conditions and provides reliable, long-term performance.

fs5111.name: FS51-11 FLOW SWITCH
fs5111.description: The LEFOO Flow Switch ensures accurate monitoring of liquid flow in industrial, HVAC, and water systems. It protects equipment by detecting low or high flow conditions and provides reliable, long-term performance.

fs52.name: FS52 FLOW SWITCH
fs52.description: The LEFOO FS52 Flow Switch is a precision-engineered device for monitoring liquid flow in HVAC, water, and industrial systems. It provides reliable detection of flow deviations, ensuring system protection, optimal performance, and long-term operational stability.
